mapper.select:
SELECT TUI.ID, TUI.INAME, TUI.CURRENTPAGEINDEX, TUI.REGDATE, TUI.EXPORTED, TUI.EXPORTEDDATE, TUI.FETCHDATE, TUI.PAGEINDEX, TUI.DISRUPTTYPENAME, TUI.AREANAME, TUI.CASECODE, TUI.PARTYTYPENAME, TUI.COURTNAME, TUI.DUTY, TUI.PERFORMANCE, TUI.GISTUNIT, TUI.GISTID, TUI.PUBLISHDATE, TUI.BUSINESSENTITY, TUI.FOCUSNUMBER, TUI.CARDNUM FROM FETCH_UNIT_INFO TUI WHERE
AND TUI.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FETCH_UNIT_INFO ( ID, INAME, CURRENTPAGEINDEX, REGDATE, EXPORTED, EXPORTEDDATE, FETCHDATE, PAGEINDEX, DISRUPTTYPENAME, AREANAME, CASECODE, PARTYTYPENAME, COURTNAME, DUTY, PERFORMANCE, GISTUNIT, GISTID, PUBLISHDATE, BUSINESSENTITY, FOCUSNUMBER, CARDNUM ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{iname}, #{currentPageIndex}, #{regDate}, #{exported}, #{exportedDate}, #{fetchDate}, #{pageIndex}, #{disruptTypeName}, #{areaName}, #{caseCode}, #{partyTypeName}, #{courtName}, #{duty}, #{performance}, #{gistUnit}, #{gistId}, #{publishDate}, #{businessEntity}, #{focusNumber}, #{cardNum} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM FETCH_UNIT_INFO WHERE
AND ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE FETCH_UNIT_INFO
INAME = #{iname,javaType=java.lang.String},
CURRENTPAGEINDEX = #{currentPageIndex,javaType=int},
REGDATE = #{regDate,javaType=java.lang.String},
EXPORTED = #{exported,javaType=boolean},
EXPORTEDDATE = #{exportedDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
FETCHDATE = #{fetchDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
PAGEINDEX = #{pageIndex,javaType=int},
DISRUPTTYPENAME = #{disruptTypeName,javaType=java.lang.String},
AREANAME = #{areaName,javaType=java.lang.String},
CASECODE = #{caseCode,javaType=java.lang.String},
PARTYTYPENAME = #{partyTypeName,javaType=java.lang.String},
COURTNAME = #{courtName,javaType=java.lang.String},
DUTY = #{duty,javaType=java.lang.String},
PERFORMANCE = #{performance,javaType=java.lang.String},
GISTUNIT = #{gistUnit,javaType=java.lang.String},
GISTID = #{gistId,javaType=java.lang.String},
PUBLISHDATE = #{publishDate,javaType=java.lang.String},
BUSINESSENTITY = #{businessEntity,javaType=java.lang.String},
FOCUSNUMBER = #{focusNumber,javaType=java.lang.String},
CARDNUM = #{cardNum,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE ID = #{id}
